question: A solenoid is 1m long and 4 cm in diameter. It has five layers of windings of 1000 turns each and carries a current of 7A. The magnetic field at the centre of the solenoid is
explanation: Note: The options seem to be formatted with missing powers in the text extraction, but option 2 (closest to 4.4 x 10^-2) is the standard answer derived from these values in similar problem sets.
